website_summaries.verdict: A moisturizing, eco-friendly glitter gel with a visible but subtle shimmer that’s perfect for all ages.
pros: Aloe vera base hydrates the skin
Doesn’t contain plastic or metal, so it’s safe for the environment
Can be used on the body, face, and hair
Glitter is finely milled to offer a subtle shimmer
cons: Isn’t vibrant or dramatic enough for some buyers
